question: One of my best friends wants to commit suicide! please help!?
question_content:
One of my best friends wants to commit suicide! Hes a huge pessimist and my other friends and I try to cheer him up all the time. His family hates him,his dad has three jobs, he thinks hes ugly and he moved two years ago from Scotland to here(Ireland) and he really misses home and had to give up acting to leave. Please help he tried to commit suicide before he would except his cousin caught him.

Please help. My other best friend just text me saying shes crying because he gonna try again! I don't know what to do . . .  please help! If you can think of anything that might help a bit say it please!!!

answers.answer_content: This is serious, you need to get an adult involved to help your friend calm down. Get a therapist for her but not the type that makes her go crazier! Talk to her, say it's not her fault, make her happy, do anything that can make her smile. Make sure that you know what's she doing at home, she might be slitting her wrists for all you know! Tell the nicest adult you ever know that can actually have the ability to help her...just make her smile a genuine smile to make her forget the pain. Don't think that people who commit suicide want to end their lives... they just want to end their pain.

You tell.  You don't screw around.  You tell his parents or a counselor at school.  His family does not want him to die (and though they have problems, probably don't hate him either).

You have knowledge important to saving his life.  His family needs to know.  This is one of those times you do not keep secrets.  It's better to lose a friend and save his life than to lose a friend that commit suicide and you knew he was going to attempt it.

i have also tried, when i get a extreme hurge to do it i have been advised by doctors to either ring nhs direct or your local out of hours doctor. if they think he is a serious risk, they will get the crisis team involved, [i have been known to the crisis team] they are very helpful. if he trys it get him straight to A&E.
samaritans[1850 60 90 90 for ireland] is also a good help, they help alot, they've helped me in the past.
try and get hold of his parents and also try to get over to see him, seeing friendly faces helps.

i hope he gets the right help
Search for a suicide hotline serving your area on google. They will coach you in what to say and how to act around him and his family, and they will send the appropriate help to him.

You need to tell someone as soon as possible a dr, police, a crisis helpline anybody! please dont ignore suicide threats even if its just a comment or joke theres no way of knowing for sure and he needs immediate help and supportx
Yes call the police and report it , call the hotlines and get advise as well ,in the US it is against the law to kill yourself and they will sent him for evaluation and get the help he needs.
Call 999 and arrange for ambulance to collect.

if i were you i wouldnt be on the internet. id go be with him, hes not gunna kill himself with you with him, you need to tell him how much he means to you, and he hurt himself you wouldnt know what to do but cry and wallow and just things from your heart.
Call the cops and get him help. Professional help.
call an ambulance, get to him asap.
